charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Term of Time Served (27 Months And 10 Days). Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be Placed on Supervised Release For A Term of 3 Years. it is Further Ordered That The Defendant Shall Pay to The United States A Special Assessment in The Amount of $100.00.

charges.charge_statute: 18:922(g)(1)   knowingly possess in or affecting commerce, ammunition and

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1)   knowingly possess in or affecting commerce, ammunition and  Receive Ammunition Which Has Been Shipped .
